column1: The Pinion MGU E1.12 combines an 85 Nm mid-mounted motor with a sealed 12-speed gearbox for smooth, responsive performance and minimal maintenance. Enjoy instant shifting, precise gear changes, and unparalleled reliability on every ride.

"" data-proportion=""true"" data-percentage=""100%,auto"" width=""100%"" height=""auto"" data-size=""100%,auto"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""1"" data-file-name=""delite5-suspension.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin=""100%,auto"" origin-size=""320,180"">
Featuring a Fox AWL 34 fork (120 mm travel), Fox Float Rhythm shock (110 mm travel), and a co-sprung rear rack, the Delite5 delivers unmatched comfort and stability across all terrains.

"" data-proportion=""true"" data-percentage=""100%,auto"" width=""100%"" height=""auto"" data-size=""100%,auto"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""2"" data-file-name=""delite5-battery.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin=""100%,auto"" origin-size=""1600,1067"">
With a removable 800 Wh TubePack battery (up to 100 miles in Eco mode) and optional dual-battery setup (up to 160 miles), the Delite5 ensures you’ll never worry about running out of power.
CARD #4: Durable Belt Drive & Low Maintenance

"" data-proportion=""true"" data-percentage=""100%,auto"" width=""100%"" height=""auto"" data-size=""100%,auto"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""3"" data-file-name=""delite5-belt-drive.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin=""100%,auto"">
The Gates Carbon Belt Drive and sealed Pinion gearbox deliver nearly maintenance-free performance for up to 10,000 km. Enjoy quiet, durable, and hassle-free riding in any conditions.

Its slim frame design gives the Roadster its sporty character: the frame’s sleek design is reminiscent of conventional bikes, while it meets the highest standards of outstanding German engineering. The Bosch Performance Line CX motor, boasting 85 Nm, and the integrated battery with 625 Wh are installed in a balanced position for top agility and riding enjoyment. The integrated cabling accentuates the linear appearance..

The powerful headlamp with daytime running light ensures better visibility in road traffic. When you’re on the go in the dark, nothing comes between you and your sporty ride, thanks to even illumination of your way and your surroundings. The Magura disc brakes ensure reliable braking even during sporty rides.

You can equip the control hub of the Roadster to meet your needs: the standard Bosch Purion 200 display is inconspicuously attached to the handlebar and provides the most important data and functions. You can also use navigation, route planning and other features with the optional Kiox 300 display.
Comfortable yet sporty while on the move.

Dynamism teamed with the comfort required for everyday life: while you feel the wind in your hair, the Suntour NCX suspension fork cushions the cobblestones and potholes in the road. And if you’d prefer even more comfort, simply opt for optional comfort kit with its curved handlebar, Ergon handles and suspension seatpost. You don’t have to do without anything when it comes to transport either: the optional carrier with the Racktime Snapit system or the front luggage carrier with loading area make the Roadster a sporty everyday companion.

The Kiox 300 display is perfect for sporty riders: it displays more than just fitness data, helping riders to optimise their training. It is even possible to pair it with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 300. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars.
<!-- Repeat the above card structure for each product -->","<!-- Example of another card -->

The front carrier fits perfectly into the overall aesthetics of the stylish front. It has a centrally fixed base plate and a sophisticated luggage strap system that allows various items of luggage to be secured.
<!-- Repeat the above card structure for each product -->","<!-- Example of another card -->

Baskets and panniers can be secured to the carrier in no time, thanks to the racktime “Snapit” system. With just a click, your load can be changed quicker than a pit stop. Accessories can be obtained from your dealer.
<!-- Repeat the above card structure for each product -->","<!-- Example of another card -->
The perfect option for anyone wanting to ride in greater comfort: the classically curved handlebar, suspension seatpost and Ergon handles enable you to sit comfortably in an upright position.
<!-- Repeat the above card structure for each product -->","<!-- Example of another card -->
Frame lock with chain lock and bag

The sturdy Abus chain lock, in addition to the Abus Shield frame lock, provides twice the security for your E-Bike. The 130 cm long chain is latched onto the frame lock and the bike can be quickly attached to the nearest lamppost or lock it together with up to three other bikes. The chain thickness of 6 mm ensures a high level of anti-theft protection. Especially practical: frame lock, chain lock and battery lock all use the same key. The bag is firmly attached to the saddle and allows quick and easy removal of the chain lock thanks to its ergonomic shape and Fidlock magnetic closure. Please note: for smaller frame sizes the lowest saddle position may not be usable when the lock bag is fitted.

Responsibility to the next generation and nature.

There is space for up to three children age 7 or younger in the 100% recyclable EPP box produced with zero emissions. And their safety is top priority: the child seats all feature 5-point seat belts, while the side impact protection provides outstanding safety in urban traffic and the central railing doubles as a grab handle. Optional accessories, such as the all-season child cover or tarpaulin, are produced in a resource-efficient manner, and the child seats are made of 100% recycled material. So now you can transport your children worry-free. (Loading surface approved for up to 70 kg. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.)
The right solution for any transport task.

The Packster 70 offers a 70-cm-long and 60-cm-wide loading surface and, with basic equipment, provides a cargo space of up to 240 litres. With the optional Cargo Carry System, the shock-absorbing and insulating EPP box can adapt to any transport project. Whether you need a level cargo surface, secure transport for standard Euro boxes or storage space for smaller objects &ndash
column2: the Cargo Carry System protects your cargo thanks to versatile elements and diverse adjustment options. You can even transport up to approx. 375 litres, securely sealed, with the optional high box cover (loading surface approved for up to 70 kg).

column1: Whether you are riding or parking, getting on and off or loading &ndash
column2: the Packster 70 is incredibly simple to use at all times. Its small turning circle means that it is ideal for riding and manoeuvring in tight spaces. And its optional Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 with Magura disc brakes ensures that you retain control even if you have to brake suddenly: it reliably prevents tires from sliding, the rear wheel from lifting, and the whole bike from skidding out to the side. But even its standard Tektro disc brakes pack quite a punch if you have to stop quickly. The combination of high-performance headlight with daytime running light and well distributed reflectors guarantees that you can see and be seen.

column1: The height-adjustable saddle and stem let you adjust the seating position of the Packster 70 to different body heights from 1.50 m to 2.00 m in the blink of an eye, making it the perfect companion to family life and a flexible replacement for your car.
The optional Control Technology Package with the Riese &
column3: ller Control Technology is synonymous with safety and dynamism: the perfectly tuned full suspension of the rear swing arm ensures a sporty riding experience and the best traction even at high speeds. The active rear swing arm, optimised front wheel suspension and co-sprung luggage carrier form the core of the Control Technology. The result is powerful propulsion and sporty riding without any loss of energy.

Vibrations and hard knocks are simply ironed out, thanks to the perfectly coordinated full suspension of the rear swing arm. The Tektro TRP C 2.3 cargo brake can withstand constant loads and provides great stability and reduced wear. The Supernova M99 Mini Pro headlight offers the best lighting conditions: the switch to high beam ensures a level of visibility otherwise only known with cars, especially in the forest and out of town, while the Supernova M99 Tail Light with brake light ensures maximum safety.

column1: * May differ depending on the availability in your country, design or configuration of the model.

The double child seat with adjustable sitting and sleeping position holds two children age seven or younger. Five-point belts ensure maximum safety. Our child seats with continuous headrest are made of 100% recycled material. The headrest can be folded down into the box if required. Alternatively, you can transport larger loads by folding up the seat part of the double child seat. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.
Double child seat and luggage shelf at the front

The double child seat with adjustable sitting and sleeping position holds two children age seven or younger. Five-point belts ensure maximum safety. Our child seats with continuous headrest are made of 100% recycled material. The front luggage rack offers maximum storage space. When folded down, it lets you transport luggage up to the size of a crate of water, and secure it, thanks to eyelets and other fastening options with additional straps. Alternatively, the luggage rack can also be used as a table for your children with space underneath for their feet. When folded up, it creates a luggage compartment, the rubber straps of which securely fix slimmer objects, like shoulder bags, in place. The 47-litre box supplied fits perfectly onto the luggage rack or into a shopping trolley and, thanks to its food-safe and recyclable PP design, is ideal for your weekly shopping. Alternatively, you can transport larger loads by folding up the seat part of the double child seat. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.

The double child seat with adjustable sitting and sleeping position along with a rear-facing single seat at the front allow you to carry up to three children age seven or younger. Five-point belts ensure maximum safety. Our child seats with continuous headrest are made of 100% recycled material. Alternatively, the seat part of the third child seat can be folded back to create a separate luggage compartment. For even more storage space, the seat parts of the double child seat can be folded up to the rear and those of the third child seat to the front. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using..

With its versatile polypropylene elements, the Cargo Carry System enables loads of various sizes to be safely transported. Depending on your needs, you have the option of a flat cargo surface, storage space in the bottom of the EPP box, up to three load compartments and a securing element for standard Euro boxes with two side pockets for smaller objects. In the event of a higher load, the cargo can be secured with additional straps using four eyelets.

The year-round cover provides protection from the wind, rain, snow and sun in any season. Its height can be adjusted depending on the position of the handlebar. The practical partial opening function and additional sun protection provide shade and pleasant cooling in summer.

We recommend strong, weatherproof tarpaulin to protect your cargo from dirt and rain. It will allow you to get your cargo to its destination clean and dry whatever the weather, while children can ride with the tarpaulin half or fully rolled back thanks to the flexible adjustment options.
The flat, lockable box cover allows you to protect transported goods with a volume of up to 240 L against wind and weather. The folding polypropylene cover allows for easy loading and unloading.

The high, lockable box cover made of EPP allows you to transport goods with the best protection and a maximum volume of about 375 L. And loading and unloading is still easy thanks to the low loading height.
The glove compartment lock means small items are safely stowed away. The lock uses the same key as the battery lock and Abus frame lock and replaces the standard magnetic closure.
Safe riding enjoyment for the young and not-so-young.

You can safely carry up to two children or a larger passenger on the back: anyone aged 8 years or older and weighing no more than 70 kg can be carried on the Passenger kit with its foam seat, handles, and footrests. The Safety bar kit is suitable for up to two children aged 1 to 7: it will carry a maximum of 50 kg and up to two child seats (DIN EN 14344). And your passengers will be well protected in all weather, thanks to the optional weather protection for the Safety bar kit. (Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.)

column1: For all your little everyday tasks. And the bigger ones too.

Regardless of whether you need to transport the weekly shop or other goods – the Multitinker effortlessly carries the load on its rear, thanks to its powerful Bosch Performance Line Cargo motor with 625 Wh battery. The front luggage carrier provides additional space
column2: and we’ve invented the frame bag for smaller items. Sideloaders are available if you need more space – holding max. 20 kg on each side – and there is also an interface for the attachment of a trailer coupling. The Multitinker is as compact as a normal E-Bike and, thanks to its low centre of gravity, is incredibly easy to ride even fully loaded up.

column3: data-proportion=""true"" data-align=""center"" data-file-name=""TransportingPeople.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="",auto"" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" width="""" height="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"" origin-size=""1600,1067"" data-index=""0"">

column1: Safe on the road at all times.

Whether getting on and off, loading or riding it – the Multitinker brings safety into everyday life with its low centre of gravity, 20-inch wheels and ingenious details like spoke guard and bipod stand. The large light cone of the dipped beam of the powerful headlight ensures that you are seen in traffic, while the superior lighting offered by the main beam always lights up the path ahead of you out of town or riding through the forest. And if you need to stop quickly, the Magura disc brakes pack quite a punch.

column1: The angle- and height-adjustable stem and easy-to-adjust seatpost let you set the seat position of the Multitinker to different body heights from 1.50 m to 2.00 m in the blink of an eye. This makes it the perfect everyday bike for the whole family, your household or a group of friends.

Its SmartphoneGrip transforms your mobile device into your bike’s display. Control the practical functions of your smartphone with the compact Purion 200 within thumb’s reach. Its adapter holds your smartphone firmly on the handlebar, charging it as you use it – either with or without cable. Suitable for use with all popular smartphones weighing a maximum of 276 g with the following dimensions: 123 to 175 mm long, 67 to 88 mm wide, and 6.8 to 13 mm deep (including case).

column1: A bike for any time and anywhere.

Minimal parking space and tight curves: you no longer have these worries with the Carrie. Thanks to its narrow 43 cm Basic Box, you ride with the agility of a regular bike, and you’ll always find a place to park in the basement bike area. Its two-legged stand lets you safely park it even when fully loaded. When collapsed, the optional Flex Box holds up to three drinks crates—choose the MIK system carrier for extra capacity. (Loading space approved up to 80 kg

"" data-proportion=""true"" data-percentage=""100%,auto"" width=""100%"" height=""auto"" data-size=""100%,auto"" data-align="""" data-file-name=""carrie-electric-power.gif"" data-file-size=""0"" origin-size=""1600,1067"" data-origin=""100%,auto"" data-index=""5"">

The Carrie features a Bosch Performance Line motor that provides smooth pedal assistance up to 25 km/h. This powerful unit makes daily commutes and heavy cargo transport effortless. Its intuitive Bosch Purion display lets you adjust support levels on the fly for exactly the boost you need.

"" data-proportion=""true"" data-percentage=""100%,auto"" width=""100%"" height=""auto"" data-size=""100%,auto"" data-align="""" data-file-name=""carrie-ride-comfort.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" origin-size=""1600,1067"" data-origin=""100%,auto"" data-index=""6"">

The Carrie’s SR Suntour suspension fork and Schwalbe tires absorb shocks on cobblestones and uneven roads, giving you stability and comfort. Adjustable seatpost and handlebars let you fine-tune your riding position for the smoothest journey, whatever the terrain.

"" data-proportion=""true"" data-percentage=""100%,auto"" width=""100%"" height=""auto"" data-size=""100%,auto"" data-align=""none"" data-file-name=""carrie_sustainable_cargo.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin=""100%,auto"" data-index=""7"" origin-size=""1600,1067"">
The cargo box is made from 100% recyclable EPP, highlighting Riese &amp
column2: Müller’s commitment to sustainability. Spacious and durable, it’s ideal for kids or groceries. Optional eco-friendly accessories (child cover, tarpaulin) let you customize your setup without compromising the planet.

column1: data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" style="""" width="""" height="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"" data-index=""0"" origin-size=""320,157"">

The Intuvia 100 display is simple and intuitive to use and offers a perfect overview of key riding data, including distance, trip duration, range, speed and riding mode. The Intuvia 100 also provides precise information on the battery charge level as a percentage. It can be conveniently operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars..

The carrier with MIK system provides even more storage space: you can quickly and securely attach pannier racks, baskets, bike accessories, and even a dog basket, to the sturdy adapter plate. Accessories can be obtained from your dealer.
<!-- Repeat the above card structure for each product -->","<!-- Example of another card -->

data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" style="""" width="""" height="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"" origin-size=""695,342"" data-index=""0"">

The by,schulz G.2 ST parallelogram-shaped spring seatpost offers a degree of comfort that makes any dirt track feel like a freshly paved road. There are five different hardness levels of suspension element to choose from depending on the rider’s weight and comfort preferences. The neoprene cover supplied protects the suspension element from dirt.
<!-- Repeat the above card structure for each product -->","<!-- Example of another card -->

data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" style="""" width="""" height="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"" origin-size=""695,342"" data-index=""0"">

The sturdy Abus chain lock, in addition to the Abus Shield frame lock, provides twice the security for your E-Bike. The 130 cm long chain is latched onto the frame lock and you can quickly lock your bike to the nearest lamppost or lock it together with up to three other bikes. The chain thickness of 6 mm ensures a high level of anti-theft protection. Especially practical: frame lock, chain lock and battery lock all use the same key. The bag is firmly attached to the saddle and allows quick and easy removal of the chain lock thanks to its ergonomic shape and Fidlock magnetic closure. Please note: for smaller frame sizes the lowest saddle position may not be usable when the lock bag is fitted.

The specification table indicates all available components for this model – not just the basic equipment. Some of the options listed are only available for a surcharge. For more information, see the Configurator. Riese
column4: Müller reserves the right to make technical modifications as well as changes to the shape, colour and/or weight within reasonable limits.

column1: * May differ depending on the availability in your country, design or configuration of the model.

The Flex Box is an extension of the Basic Box (45 by 30 cm) for transporting larger loads and offers numerous transport options both when folded out and in. When collapsed, it is high enough to transport a regular drinks crate. And when folded out, its extended area of approx. 45 by 65 cm provides ample space for your weekly shopping or sports bag. It is fitted with a box lock that protects your load from unwanted access, if need be.

data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" style="""" width="""" height="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"" data-index=""0"" origin-size=""695,342"">

The Flex Box is an extension of the Basic Box (45 by 30 cm) for transporting larger loads and offers numerous transport options both when folded out and in. When collapsed, it is high enough to transport a regular drinks crate. And when folded out, its extended area of approx. 45 by 65 cm provides ample space for your weekly shopping or sports bag. It is fitted with a box lock that protects your load from unwanted access, if need be.

data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" style="""" width="""" height="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"" data-index=""0"" origin-size=""695,342"">

The headrest offers additional safety, especially when transporting taller children. A sturdy bench seat that can be suspended in the Flex Box in two different ways serves as a child seat. Depending on its position, it will accommodate either one taller or two smaller children age seven or younger – reliably protected by the five-point seat belts. And the comfortable back cushion automatically folds in when the Flex Box is closed. However, when the headrest is fitted, it cannot be closed. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.

data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" style="""" width="""" height="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"" data-index=""0"" origin-size=""695,342"">

The child cover reliably protects your younger passengers from the wind, rain and sun. It can be combined with the optional Flex Box, which can still be easily folded out and closed even when the child cover is fitted. The cover includes an additional panel that you can either use to darken the viewing window or as a rear panel. We have deliberately refrained from using fibreglass rods and PVC film material in the production process..

data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" style="""" width="""" height="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"" origin-size=""695,342"" data-index=""0"">

The practical cargo bag with two handles is perfect for loading and unloading your cargo. Alternatively, pre-drilled holes mean that you can screw it permanently to the floor of the Basic Box. The cargo bag holds up to 90 litres. There is also a zipped pocket on its outside that can hold smaller items.
